Uses of Interface
org.tquadrat.foundation.config.ConfigBeanSpec

Packages that use ConfigBeanSpec
Package
Description
org.tquadrat.foundation.config
This module provides a facility for the runtime configuration of a program.
org.tquadrat.foundation.config.spi
The classes that are used to implement the functionality of a configuration bean

  • Uses of ConfigBeanSpec in org.tquadrat.foundation.config

    Subinterfaces of ConfigBeanSpec in org.tquadrat.foundation.config
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    CLIBean
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Replaced by CLIBeanSpec.
    interface 
    CLIBeanSpec
    When a configuration bean should be initialised from the command line, the respective specification interface needs to extend this interface.
    interface 
    ConfigBeanBase
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Replaced by ConfigBeanSpec.
    interface 
    I18nSupport
    A configuration bean specification has to extend this interface in order to get the i18n support.
    interface 
    INIBeanSpec
    When a configuration bean should be connected with an INI file (a Windows style configuration file), the respective configuration bean specification interface needs to extend this interface.
    interface 
    PreferencesBean
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Replaced by PreferencesBeanSpec.
    interface 
    PreferencesBeanSpec
    When a configuration bean should be connected with Preferences, the respective configuration bean specification interface needs to extend this interface.
    interface 
    SessionBean
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Replaced by SessionBeanSpec.
    interface 
    SessionBeanSpec
    The interface for a configuration bean that allows multiple instances ("Sessions").
